title: A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime
content:
1. A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime  CNN
  2. Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Insider
  3. Muslim family killed in 'premeditated' truck attack  BBC News
  4. Vehicle attack on Muslim family 'terrorist' event, says council of Canadian Muslims  thestar.com
  5. Man suspected of killing Canadian Muslim family with his truck was motivated by hate — police  INQUIRER.net
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
A driver slams into a family, killing four people, in what Canadian police say was an anti-Islamic hate crime  CNN 
Police say a driver who hit and killed 4 pedestrians in Ontario targeted them because they were Muslim  Insider
Muslim family killed in 'premeditated' truck attack  BBC News
Vehicle attack on Muslim family 'terrorist' event, says council of Canadian Muslims  thestar.com
Man suspected of killing Canadian Muslim family with his truck was motivated by hate — police  INQUIRER.net

localize.title: ドライバーが家族に衝突し、4人が死亡 カナダ警察は反イスラムの憎悪による犯罪と発表
一名司机撞向一个家庭，造成4人死亡，加拿大警方称这是一起反伊斯兰教的仇恨犯罪。
一名司機撞向一個家庭，造成4人死亡，加拿大警方稱這是一起反伊斯蘭教的仇恨犯罪。
